title: Easy Venison Casserole
ingredients: ['2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 onion, chopped', '2 cloves minced garlic', '450g venison, cut into strips', '2 (400g) tins chopped tomatoes', '200g sliced mushrooms', '1/2 teaspoon dried thyme', '1/2 teaspoon dried sage', '1/4 teaspoon dried tarragon', '1/4 teaspoon salt']
